about.title: about me
text: I am currently studying Computer Science at University Gabriel Rene Moreno, with a focus in Software Systems and Artificial Intelligence. Last year, I was on a one year internship at

I'm into any sort of software development that requires creativity. My other areas of interest include machine learning, human-computer interactions and frontend development. I also like my fair share of visual arts and video editing. In my free time, I practice judo and play video games.
